pages.text: Mandrakes are a group of perennial herbaceous plants with long, parsnip shaped roots.$(br2)The screams of this plant can cause injury or death. Wear earmuffs and harvest at night to reduce risk.$(br2)$(bold)Procurement:$()$(br)Known to be dropped by Tall Grass
Wearing earmuffs will protect against the mandrake's screams.
